{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cloud Engines |model=Pogoplug |revision=E01 |upc=850877002009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=GlobalScale |manuf_model=003-SP1001 |manuf_rev=3.0 |type=NAS |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=HY27UF084G2M |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=E1108ACBG-8E-E |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header,, J4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, J2 |eth_cpu=yes |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2;,,, 1MHz 4.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG47E;;1;,,, Programmable Current Limit High-Side Switch;Micrel;MIC2544;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Cloud Engines (3.4.16); |stock_os=Linux; 2.6.22.18;LSP Version KW_LSP_4.2.7_patch2; |tp_firmware=Debian, Arch Linux (Arm) |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=ceadmin |oui_eth=00:25:31 }} [http://pogoplug.com/opensource GPL Source code]
<small>"[[GlobalScale|GLOBALSCALE]] TECHNOLOGIES, INC. WWW.GLOBALSCALETECHNOLOGIES.COM REV3.0"</small> printed on board.
See also [[List of Cloud Engines Devices]]..
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 Kirkwood @1.2GHz :Architecture: ARMv5te *RAM: 256MB (DDR2-800) *Flash: 512MB (NAND) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 *LAN: 1x GbE (RJ45)
